text: [Bob]: I saw Alice vent in Electrical.
[Alice]: That's a lie, I was in Cafeteria and then Weapons the entire time.
[Dave]: Bob, you were with Alice, Charlie, Erin, and me in Cafeteria at the start, so how could you have seen her vent in Electrical?
[Bob]: My mistake, it was Medbay, not Electrical, I saw Alice vent – I was panicking and got confused.
[Alice]: Bob, you're changing your story again – first Electrical, then Medbay – why should we believe anything you say?
[Dave]: Bob, you claimed to see Alice vent in Medbay, but Charlie's body was found in Medbay – were you there when Charlie died?
[Bob]: I was in Medbay with Charlie; he was doing a scan, I left briefly, and when I returned, he was dead – I panicked when I saw Alice vent and got the locations mixed up.
[Alice]: Bob, you saw me vent *after* Charlie's scan, meaning you were in Medbay twice, once with Charlie alive, and again when he was dead – please explain your movements in detail, step by step.

[Dave]: Bob, your explanation is full of inconsistencies; if you were with Charlie during his scan, how could you also see Alice vent *after* he was dead, unless you were present both times, placing you at the scene of the crime?
[Bob]: Look, I was stressed and made a mistake about the location – I saw Alice vent, and she's trying to confuse everyone with these details to avoid suspicion; she's the impostor.
[Alice]: Bob, your constantly shifting story about where and when you "saw me vent" only makes you look more suspicious, especially since you were present at the scene of Charlie's death.

[Dave]: Bob, can you provide a precise timeline of your movements, including when you were in Medbay with Charlie, when you "saw Alice vent," and when you found Charlie's body – specific times and locations will help clarify your story.

[Bob]: Dave, I understand I've made mistakes in my recounting of events due to the shock of finding Charlie's body; I was in Medbay with Charlie, then went to Admin briefly, returned to find Charlie dead, and saw Alice venting, which made me mix up details initially.

[Alice]: Bob, claiming you "saw me vent" after finding Charlie's body directly contradicts your earlier placement of me at the scene *before* his death; this inconsistency, coupled with your shifting locations and refusal to provide a clear timeline, strongly suggests you're the impostor.
[Dave]: Bob, you initially placed Alice at the scene *before* Charlie's death, now you're saying it was *after*; this inconsistency makes you look suspicious.
